item.title: DeepLink Misconfiguration: Accessing PIX and AccountÂ Data
item.description: While analyzing an application, I noticed that some deeplink calls contained the “path” parameter, and this parameter was being used to define the path of the WebView that the application was accessing. Controlling the Path with Deeplinks So, we could control the path that the WebView was loading, but what if there was an “@” in the path parameter? If we try to put an “@” in the path parameter, we can control the site that will be loaded in the application’s WebView because instead of accessing https://help-webview.
